Steps.Message: Update at 20:52 - Our engineers are back on site to further investigate the power cut today. We're sorry for the disruption this may be causing. If you're worried about elderly or ill neighbours, we can offer help and support to our vulnerable customers during a power cut. Find out more here: http://bit.ly/18Me8R8. If you have any concerns, please call us on 08003163105.

We became aware of a power cut at 15:23. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 20:52 - Our engineers are back on site to further investigate the power cut today. We're sorry for the disruption this may be causing. If you're worried about elderly or ill neighbours, we can offer help and support to our vulnerable customers during a power cut. Find out more here: http://bit.ly/18Me8R8. If you have any concerns, please call us on 08003163105.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
